intro: Memecylon eurhynchum, commonly known as the small-leaved memecylon, is a species of flowering plant in the family Melastomataceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa, particularly found in countries such as Kenya and Tanzania. The plant typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 3 meters. Its leaves are opposite, elliptical, and often have a glossy appearance. The flowers are small, clustered in dense inflorescences, and are usually pink or red in color.
